website_summaries.verdict: A budget model with durability issues that is meant to give elementary-aged kids a taste of drumming.
pros: A low-priced, complete drum set for children 3 to 10

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive drum set. I bought it for my 3 year old son for Christmas 2k16. Have to admit I play it more than he does at the moment. Attached a video to share how it sounds. I'm no professional just know a thing or two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandsons, especially my younger one. Daniel is having a hard time settling down in school and he's wanted a drum set for a long time. Grandpa and I thought we might help motivate him with this purchase. His stepdad is a drum player and willing to teach him. Sure enough, the concentration needed for this has moved over to his school work. Sometimes a child needs to feel good about him/herself and finding 1 thing they are good at helps them improve other areas. My grands love this drum set and their stepdad says it should be fine for them until they are about 11 or 12 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon  M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The hanging toms are 8 and 10 inches. The floor tom is 12 inches. The bass is 16 and the snare is 10 inches. For the price, this is a great little set. The hardware is a bit cheap (e.g. the hi-hat stand is a bit loose and the cymbal connection on the bass drum wiggles). If your child is interested in staying with it, it is very easy to upgrade the batter and resonant heads as well as the cymbals. The edging on the drums is a little rough though, so if you go this route they could do with a quick sanding and/or bearing edge conditioner. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gray

customer_reviews.title: What a great starter set!
customer_reviews.text: I was terribly impressed with the quality of this set for the price. As a 60 yr old gramma, my first thought on assembly was PANIC. However, the instruction were superb and step by step, even TUNING. Done in 1 hour! We had only 1 minor fracture in a tom tom arm that wasn’t deep but after contacting customer service, another was sent. Communication was A+! All around, this is an excellent starter for kids!
customer_reviews.author: donna briquet

customer_reviews.title: WoW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised by the quality of this drum set. Compared to the prices I saw at a music store I didn't expect this to be so good. It looks, feels and sounds like the expensive stuff I saw at the store. I'm very pleased. I had somehow lost a bolt for a Tom and the company sent me a new one free of charge and quick. I tried to find the email to tell the company thanks but can't. So hopefully they will read this and Know just how happy I am with the drums and there company. Thanks a lot!
customer_reviews.author: aaron whitesel

customer_reviews.title: Dont Hesitate! Buy this it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2 1/2 year old. He loves it! Perfect size for now, this set will last him a few years. Set feels just like a real one. Heavy duty! I bought a Velocity plastic set before this one I wish I would have saved that money and went with this instead from the jump. That set lasted him 1 month tops before falling apart from abuse. I love how everything is wood and metal. Sturdy stuff. I'm extremely satisfied with this product. This drum set will be in our family for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: The thing to remember is that this drum set is intended for kids. The hardware might not hold up to overtightening or adult intensity playing and the drum heads don’t sound great, but the point is for a kid to have fun and begin to learn limb independence. To that end, this kit is great! My daughter is 18 months old and can’t reach the pedals but enjoys playing with the sticks so far.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Arkens

customer_reviews.title: Good drums, good price
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for any kid who really wants to play. My nephew is 4 and its perfect for him... They sound really good. The only con to this would be the hi hat keeps falling down and you have to constantly adjust, the floor toms leg wont stay put if you move it, the instructions are sucky, and the drum sticks are easily broken. I would suggest talking to someone who knows aboit drums to help with setup and tuning. The instructions really do not help you. We had a cousin come over and get my nephew all the way together.
customer_reviews.author: Neisha

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this set for our then two-year-old. My husband is a drummer. It was the perfect size. He was still too little but eventually grew into it. He kind of lost interest when he was four or so but I would totally recommend it for ages ranging from 2 to even 12 years old. My husband who is 40, 230 lb would sit on the stool and play himself. It is extremely durable and a fantastic set. It is not a toy, it's a real set.
customer_reviews.author: Melo21

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this for himself with Christmas money, it took about 45 minutes/1 hour to assemble and I was very impressed with the good sound quality and so far, months later, we haven't had to tighten anything up which is nice!
customer_reviews.author: ItalianSis

customer_reviews.title: Good product great customer support
customer_reviews.text: We had this for almost one year now and my kids love it. The quality is really good for a starting kit for kids; I am extremely happy with the customer support: We lost a small piece that holds the cymbals and I wrote Gammon; answer was fast; they asked for details and pictures of the missing part and are sending a replacement, no charge. Awesome..
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: however the quality of the hardware and the sound of the drums is very good. This was for my 9 year old granddaughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Did a ton of reviews before purchasing this drum set. The most negative comment is that the cymbals are cheap. This is true, however the quality of the hardware and the sound of the drums is very good. This was for my 9 year old granddaughter who expressed interest in the drums and I didn't want to pay a fortune to find out if she was really going to take them up For the price these are very satisfactory and I would recommend anyone else with the same circumstance to purchase this set.
customer_reviews.author: John 3:16

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome set
customer_reviews.text: This drum set is awesome. My daughter loves this set. Exactly what she wanted. Super good price. Super good quality. Lots of pieces to set up but my bf had no problem setting it up. My daughter who is 8 was ecstatic.
customer_reviews.author: Linzy

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: Very good but not suitable if you live in a condominium.
customer_reviews.author: The technician

customer_reviews.title: Fun starter kit for young kids
customer_reviews.text: The size and the fun color options are great for my 6 and 8 year old kids. They have been able to dent some of the drums fairly easily, but the sound is pretty good and they have a good time practicing rhythm and coordination. My biggest issue with quality is that the stands for some of the drums dont hold well, even when tightened all the way, so that they are slipping down on one side or another. But for the cost, the product meets expectations and we enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: I’m really happy with the quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 5 year old for Christmas, I’m really happy with the quality for the price. Putting it together I was impressed with the quality and sturdiness of the parts, it doesn’t feel like a wobbly little kid toy. It was as the reviews and blogs promised and he loves it (id reccomend the sound dampening pads for the drum heads so they can play whenever they want)
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little drum set
customer_reviews.text: Truly awesome little drum set. Sounds great and easy to assemble. Only complaint is that the high hat stand is a little wobbly, but it’s a great set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lawrie

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: This drum was kinda of fun to assemble but I like doing that kind of thing. They are very nice and good for my daughter. After assembly, I was missing a piece to the bass pedal and the snare was busted. I reached out to customer service and I was hoping it was an easy fix as I didnt want to take down the drums to return it. I ended up taking pics of what was missing and the busted snare and they sent me a snare head and pedal peice no questions asked. I am pleased with my purchase and the ease of getting missing and broken pieces replaced.
customer_reviews.author: StayinTrue

customer_reviews.title: but is still pretty aggressive. The drumset has held up for him ...
customer_reviews.text: After spending a lot of money on the cheap plastic drumsets, I finally decided to splurge and buy this set for a friend's 2 year old. He loves to drum, but is still pretty aggressive. The drumset has held up for him for over 6 months now and it's the only "toy" that he is constantly still playing on. His parents had to wrap the ends of the drumsticks with something to dampen the noise a bit, and they are not happy with me because these drums are the real deal--- they will be LOUD :)
customer_reviews.author: Savvystudent

customer_reviews.title: Quality, durable drums
customer_reviews.text: Perfect drum set for our then 5 year old. Very sturdy and professional quality. My daughter is now 6 and the drums are still in perfect condition like the day they came. She loves playing them! Don’t pay more than you need. We looked at lots of sets before deciding on these and it was a great decision. Size is perfect for a child 3 years to about 8 depending on height. Fits my 6 year old perfectly. She’s average height.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: My son is obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my 6 year old. The construction of the set is really sturdy and I cannot believe the value for the price. The reason for 4 stars vs 5 is the crash cymbal came apart within 3 months. It didn't crack - the whole bell came off. The company stands by their product and are happily replacing the broken cymbal. Otherwise the set is great, holding up to lots of playing morning and night, and my son would be lost without it.
customer_reviews.author: TX Mom

customer_reviews.title: IT COULD BE BETTER.
customer_reviews.text: For more I watch the GAMMON VIDEO on line to arrange the set for my 5yrs old, I could not, I called my brother which is musician, and he told miss a piece. We still managed to arrange it, but my son could see there is something missing, as he is taking drum class. As my son does not feel comfortable with, well me neither.
customer_reviews.author: MARHY J. F.

customer_reviews.title: Great 'Child' Drum Set
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 8 year old son. He loves to make noise with them. Hopefully one day it will sound like music. This is a great set for a child starting off. I sat on his stool to give them a shot myself, to no fault of the Gammon, it does not hold a 200 lb man. Look for my future review of a 'child drum stool' since I will be replacing this one. "Sorry little man, Daddy will get you a new one".
customer_reviews.author: Ernie A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for Christmas and it has been great! Great quality for the price. I would buy again in a second. I'm a semi-professional musician of 20 years and I know quality when I see it. This is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Austin W.

customer_reviews.title: Quality item!
customer_reviews.text: This drumset looks just like a small version of my husband's, and my 3 year old loves it! It is great quality and was easy to put together by my husband. Very happy with this purchase. Has been played many times by a 3 yrs old since Christmas and is still working and looking great.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Jr drum kit
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my grandson he loved this drum kit it was. The perfect size and not a toy. He will be able to get several years of use out of them then I will be able to resale them as long as they are taken care of very nice set
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Great for young drummers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my grandson. It is great. Looks really professional He loves it?
customer_reviews.author: vjack

customer_reviews.title: Super buy
customer_reviews.text: This set of drums far exceeded my and my husband's expectations. Great quality, easy to put together and my five year old grandson was over-the-top when we unveiled it for his fifth birthday. Delivery was quick as well. Very, very pleased with our purchase. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DEO

customer_reviews.title: Great for decoration, not quality
customer_reviews.text: They look great, easy enough to assemble but poor quality. I'm very disappointed by the quality. My son doesn't use it as much as I hoped so it's definitely not because he was hard on the set. They're almost just decoration. How they are falling apart is besides me. I can probably get someone to fix the pieces that have come loose but it's only a year old. Seems early for me to have to pay for servicing especially when they don't get used
customer_reviews.author: Devin Kyser

customer_reviews.title: Very neat!
customer_reviews.text: It was a super neat drumset! I bought this drum set for my nephew. It was pretty easy to assemble. When I assembled it and he saw it he was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Syuzanna

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Saved the best gift for last. My 9 year old son absolutely loves these drums. Forgot to order ear plugs. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great drum set!
customer_reviews.text: Great drum set! This thing is awesome, it sets up easily and is tough as nails. My kids can’t get enough of it
customer_reviews.author: Zach W

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works great, even the husband can throw a beat down on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great drumset
customer_reviews.text: Drums are perfect for my 10 year old. Not too big not too small - just right
customer_reviews.author: Carlye Shore

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: As a drummer, assembly was a breeze, construction surprising good, and contrary to a few reviews I read while researching junior drum kits, Gammon hardware is sturdy. Drums have many bolts, and wing nuts, so take care threading them, stripping any bolt will ruin its purpose. I looked at the assembly instructions, and they seemed complete. As advertised this kit is sized for about 2-8 year olds. A larger player would probably damage the heads, pedals, throne, and cymbals. In half the drums tone is not great, and the cymbals thin and tinny, still a surprising value.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: this is not adult size
customer_reviews.text: i actually bought these for my youth group because we were lacking a drum kit but i didnt realize this was not a full size drum kit, rather it was a kid version. DUH ME it was in the title but it was my fault. the drum kit looks nice and for the price it was great IF it was used for kids. so make sure to read the description and make sure it is the right size.
customer_reviews.author: EverythingLina

customer_reviews.title: For the money it is a very nice set I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: My ten-year-old son loves this set what's good for the price and it's a very nice set for the price nice learning set for kids
customer_reviews.author: Melissa . Anderson

customer_reviews.title: These drums are great!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been playing these drums daily for two years now. The cymbal cracked after a year and a half, it's expected. The bass drum pedal's spring broke a couple months ago, that's a wear item that is expected to break. Bottom line, he loves this drum kit, and I expect him to play it until he physically out grows it. Very durable, great value in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter set for kids - good price point
customer_reviews.text: The first time my Son sat down and beat the drums on my friends 5-piece set in a garage, we knew we had to get him his own set. After a lot of research and reading reviews, these were a perfect option. Well built and not too difficult to get together, I would highly recommend them for any kid 4+. The hi-hat action isn't great, but I think that's more my fault than the product. I play piano and have no experience with drums, but he sure does love them! They sound good and after 8 months or so, they are holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: revitus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!!! Outstanding price I got round Christmas 2013.
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit of a pain to put together. easier to do with one person, since two may have one putting the wrong size pieces in the wrong drum making you redo all. Do by self, trust me! Other than making sure you are putting the right pieces where, it is amazing quality. It's like m brothers real drumset, but fancier it seems. This is a real drumset, with the real sounds expected and well made. it shouldnt fall apart, even my 3 yr old son has been hammering away at it and its held up the same as Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty1430

customer_reviews.title: Looks user cute, company funked up
customer_reviews.text: Arms for hanging drums wont tighten Chipped large drum edge Leg on floor drum is larger then others won't allow leg to fit, to stand u Update:So they send me a replace leg, still didn't fit perfect but hell with it. Send me an arm for the tom drum. .at least he can play it now few weeks after his bday.
customer_reviews.author: Classic Generation

customer_reviews.title: Good sound!
customer_reviews.text: They sound really good for a junior set, and they're decent quality. I think my grandson will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Bullers

customer_reviews.title: Little Drummer Boy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for our 2 year old. His dad is a drummer and the 3 pc sets just weren't enough. This set has been perfect! Although I'm not a pro, the sound quality seems good for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya T.

customer_reviews.title: I love this drum set
customer_reviews.text: I love this drum set! I had bought a less expensive set from a different vendor and it was damaged when received but not shipping damage, just poor quality. This set is really nice. Quality contruction and the sound is realistic. It is a little bigger than expected but that means our grands can use them for a few years. Great product for the price. Can’t wait for our first jam session!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for kids from 2 years to 12 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought this drum set for my 6 year old son. Perfect size for kids from 2 years to 12 years. Packaging was good however assembling it requires careful reading and patience! I recommend this to anyone who has a child interested in wanting to learn drumming.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Great value for young beginner - bring it back!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Bought this for my 4yo son, but adults could sit and play on it too. Unfortunately, we moved and now you don't have these anymore. Would love to repurchase. We donated it to our school and they were thrilled. It is a full set including seat, perfect for beginners. It isn't the best quality, but it was a GREAT VALUE for a young beginner. Sorry, but I don't want to spend 3 times the price as an experiment to see how interested my young child is in an instrument. This was perfect. Other sets are 3 pieces and are simply toys. This was a big step up and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: TravelMom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for a future drumer around 8 to 12.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old LOVES these and plays them every day. He pretens he is a rocker and is hard on them. They are very durable and holds up. Tbese are worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Ocker

customer_reviews.title: Short seat.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about it but was happily surprised to see it was actually made better than my old kits when I was semi pro. The heads are real and durable , the symbols are the same thickness as the lite grade symbols in the music store. The seat is really limited though, it does not extend as high as one would hope because you want your child to play it as they grow longer legs. The seat is made durable enough though.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Great kids starter set
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a starter set for my son. For what it is, I’m pleased. Something for him to learn the basics on. Easy to put together and set up. Tunes up quick. Again, if you’re looking for a starter set for a small kid just starting out, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hope

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made. Looks like a real set but for a child. My grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8 yr old learning drums. Has a great sound. Approved by his drum teacher.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: A Winner!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for my son for Christmas. They are just like the reviews said-a real drum set that's sturdy and beautiful. We love them. My husband might play them even more than our son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Drum Set
customer_reviews.text: My child loves this drum set, my only concern was finally resolved, see the photo. I strongly recommended to insert a ball something similar in order to avoid injuries.
customer_reviews.author: cambelo

customer_reviews.title: don't listen to reviewers who weren't happy this wasn't Kieth Moon's drum kit
customer_reviews.text: completely awesome for newbs and babes. NOT for full blown drummers, so don't listen to reviewers who weren't happy this wasn't Kieth Moon's drum kit. Got it for my two and seven year-olds. they bang the hell out of these and they have stood the test of time. make sure you tighten all the hardware well when assembling.
customer_reviews.author: ReinlessJane

customer_reviews.title: For Tall 4 year old - Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this for a child older than 6. This drum set is definitely junior size, but, perfect for my 4 year old. The sound quality is good, and we have had to tune it twice since it was built at Christmas time 2013, which isn't bad, since my toddler plays with it everyday. The lettering did smear a bit when my son first started playing with the set. I'd say the set up process wasn't as smooth as I read on here... but, we made it! A great introduction set for the price!
customer_reviews.author: CrystalKennedy

customer_reviews.title: still being used weekly
customer_reviews.text: still a hit with the children even after all these years.
customer_reviews.author: whynot

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a young kid learning the fundamentals. It sounds ok. It’s obviously not a real set with crisp sound but al the parts are there to get the fundamentals down. I am 36 and occasionally will sneak behind it for fun
customer_reviews.author: thomas crippen

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his drums. Everyday when he comes home from school it is the first thing that he plays with.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: but other than that this item is great.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. This is his 3rd drum set and it has withstood a few beatings. One of the legs/ on the smaller drums keeps getting lose, but other than that this item is great.
customer_reviews.author: k.justice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for our 8-year-old grandson
customer_reviews.text: 8-year-old grandson loves this drum set. He loves to play with gusto and has a special spot in the garage. The drumsticks broke the first week but they were replaced and all is well
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Sandi

customer_reviews.title: I feel it was a good investment and he'll have them for quite a few ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my 2 year old after he beat a hole through his toy set! I feel it was a good investment and he'll have them for quite a few years until it's time to upgrade to something bigger! He loves em! It's a great starter set at a reasonable price.. excellent quality and very durable...they also arrived on time I will definitely be purchasing with this seller again one day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Drumset!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drumset. It's got all of the essential pieces and it's perfect for my little one (2 y.o.) but I think I might be playing it more than him. The sound is great and perfect for a beginner set. I'd recommend for anyone who's trying to get their kid into drumming or to just develop a general sense of tempo.
customer_reviews.author: Everymang

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time. It was not very easy but I assembled in an hour. After assembling it looked great. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a starter dummer and a reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a starter dummer and a reasonable cost. Everything came in as expected and was super easy to set up. My son LOVES it and drums away on it everyday. All the kids that we have over love it too!
customer_reviews.author: C T

customer_reviews.title: Really like the real thing!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this set and are very happy with the size and the quality of the metal. We dont have to worry about this falling over or breaking on the first hit. The drum heads are good quality too and she plays just like her dad. This is a set she can grow with and we are very happy with it. We did buy little sticks though, because this one comes with sticks without the plastic on the tips. We are very happy with it and this will be played for many years.
customer_reviews.author: nell

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's better than the $30 ones for kids and definitely bigger. Was disappointed because there were thumbscrews missing, and the ones that are there keep loosening so things don't stay in place. They also failed to thread one of the screw holes for one of the toms, so the drum is out of tune because there is no way to tighten that side. 1 star for quality and 5 stars because my 3 year old loves it anyway = 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: dontjudgememunky

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, great price
customer_reviews.text: Good set for beginners to advance that just want to play around. (Adults would need a better seat) good sound and good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Onyx

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and very well packed. Very high quality drums and pretty easy to set up. This is not a toy set, but are real drums in a junior size. My 7 year old granddaughter loves them and so does her 10 year brother. Very happy with the purchase. I would reccommend this product and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: thayer

customer_reviews.title: Girls love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our girls bang away on these daily. The instructions were horrible and didn’t explain how the drums should be arranged.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is like that of a full size
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality drum set. The sound quality is like that of a full size. It definitely does not sound like a toy. This is a great set if you are planning on having your child take drum lessons. Has all of the needed pieces. Drum stool is high quality. Great quality for the price. So far, stands up to the playing of our 4 1/2 year old who has wanted one for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Padraic

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at the quality of the components! This is a great little set bought for our 3 yo nephew at lowest setting fits him perfect right now and looks as if will fit him through roughly through age 8-10 depending on size!! The bright blue is beautiful and black and chrome accents really set it off!!
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Love this Set!
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my daughter's 7th birthday. She loves them and so does her 5-year old sister. it's a pretty sturdy set. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Clang76

customer_reviews.title: Loud noises
customer_reviews.text: Yeah that was a good idea getting a 7 year old a drum set. The drums work they make loud noises too bad the dang kid dont know how to make those noises sound good.
customer_reviews.author: dcdimattia

customer_reviews.title: Absolute excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of drums. Being a drummer myself I bought this for my grandson. It is just a perfect miniature of a full size set and sounds terrific. The stands and pedals are solid as is the throne. The only poor thing about the kit is the cymbals but then what would expect for a kit in this price range. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gord hayford

customer_reviews.title: Sounds pretty good although not like a professional set
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to put together as other reviews stated. It had directions and was put together in about an hour. Sounds pretty good although not like a professional set. The most difference is in the symbol sound but the kids don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: simply perfect!
customer_reviews.text: this is my first 5/5 stars review, ever! usually i give 4/5 as there's almost always room for improvement,but not this time! great price for a present so perfect the whole family not just my Godson took turns withit! delivery was timed perfectly!! Ihope this review helps someone go ahead and place an order.You won't be dissapointed! the gift of music is very important It's a gift that helps others to give froim thier hearts!! /Alexavier
customer_reviews.author: alexavier s strangerz

customer_reviews.title: Set up was pretty easy, even for us folks that have no ...
customer_reviews.text: The Complete 5-Piece Black Junior Drum Set with Cymbals Stands Sticks Hardware & Stool was purchased on Amazon. The package came quickly and all parts were included. Set up was pretty easy, even for us folks that have no idea what a drum set is really supposed to look like. However, when placing the small mounted tom on, the nut came right out, and a piece came off with it. I have two pictures attached. Sorry for the blurriness. Even without this piece our 5-year old says "THIS IS AWESOME!" ------Will follow up, as we have put in an inquiry to get this tom replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: An instrument, not a toy.
customer_reviews.text: Great little drum set! Compared to my full size Ddrum kit it is well made and is definitely an instrument and not a toy. The cymbals leave a little to be desired but they get the job done. I put tape on the underside to settle down their clangy sound a little. The heads work for now, but as my daughter gets older we will need stronger heads.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Good Set!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect sized set for my 6 year old. Great quality product and came with sticks, which was a plus. The only reason I am giving 4 stars is because the instructions are written for people who really know drums and not so much for a parent gifting this to a child. I eventually got it together and my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Felice TV

customer_reviews.title: great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: my eight yr old granddaughter started on this and within about six months was ready for a full size kit. this junior set was perfect to get her started without spending lots of money
customer_reviews.author: thekla oreilly

customer_reviews.title: Gift for grandson
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for grandson. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Undisco Kidd

customer_reviews.title: A+ Quality materials, great looking
customer_reviews.text: The set is great. Design, sound and appearance are simply awesome. Installation instructions clear and legible made the assembly a snap. Overall a high quality product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For beginner
customer_reviews.text: It’s what I was looking for. My children loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheermeela D.

customer_reviews.title: Great junior drum set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Sound great. My 6 year old loves these drums and they work great for his drum lessons. I'm very pleased with this drum set!
customer_reviews.author: Marlana B. McAlpin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my 3yr old
customer_reviews.text: 2018.01.05 Bought it for my daughter for Christmas. She loves it, installation was easy enough. May need to buy another set of drum sticks. These are getting pretty dented up but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: MLMcClusky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drum set!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for my kids for x mas. Great for beginners and introducing them to playing the drums. Price is extremely reasonable for everything you get!!
customer_reviews.author: Takayuki Ueno

customer_reviews.title: Great kids starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: These are actually very decent for the price. My 8 year old daughter loves them. I do wish the cymbals, hihat stand, and kick pedal were a bit better quality, but didn't expect much for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jared W.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This drum set is superb. We got it for our toddler and it is adjustable. There is nothing to complain a bit in this set. It will grow with him which is a great benefit. It's great quality for a child enthusiast. It sounds great! Only thing we need bow is better insulation in his room.
customer_reviews.author: KSmith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was ecstatic to see this sitting in her playroom on Christmas morning!!!! She is 2 years old (almost 3) and she loves it. A little big for her, but not a huge deal. She will grow in to it and will continue to fit her well for many years to come! Pretty simple to put together. Looks beautiful, Sounds beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Better value. Shows saving money doesn't always save money
customer_reviews.text: Great for 6-year-old. Considered the cheap $90 ones at Toysrus but realized for the better size, sound and extra pieces, this was the better value that won't have to be upgraded until he's a teen. Looks intensely impressive Christmas morning, too! Cons? Just that wish there had been just a LITTLE pre-assembly involved!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Amazing complete junior drum set
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter really loved her new drum set. Assembly of the drum set didn't take too much time. No tools were needed. Instructions were easy to follow and the internet link was a must to see. The drum set was delivered a day late but that was understandable. A train derailment held up the time of delivery. The assembled drum set was impressive and sounded very good also.
customer_reviews.author: Ando T.

customer_reviews.title: I'm sorry guys these cymbals sound cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great set to see if your kids have the aptitude and like the drums before committing to something more expensive or bigger. It arrived quickly and nothing was missing. easy to assemble, decent quality skins and sounds great. High hat sounds bad, cymbals for this set are cheap, sound bad.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Great kit. Comparable to a beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Being a drummer for the past 20 years I've seen some cheap starter and kids sets but this kit really impressed me. I bet with some good heads this thing wouldn't sound half bad.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME
customer_reviews.text: This drum set is nice ! Our granddaughter loves it. It's a great size for youth with room to grow. Oh' and it's pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My kids loves these- should make band practice easier for him at home. I would recommend some earplugs, but the form function and quality of these drums is way better than I could have hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan H.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds BIG!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is a bit smaller than I had anticipated but it sounds like an average sized set! I’m well pleased and I’m sure my son will enjoy it because I’m smiling after playing it 🤣😁
customer_reviews.author: Akil Snipe

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little playset. They are not crazy loud, but have all the bells and whistles of a larger set. We have both the child and the adult set. Very happy with the junior set, very unhappy with the adult set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Got this for my 2.5year old son and he loves it! I can see him using this set for at least 5years. Wish the chair was a bit lower but he’ll grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Cymbals suck, but this is for toddlers here
customer_reviews.text: Been playing drums for 20+ years, bought this for my kiddo the past Christmas. He doesn't play it much...but it's a solid kit, especially for kids. It's a lot more solid than I was expecting. Cymbals suck, but this is for toddlers here. End of the day, definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Howard

customer_reviews.title: One of the screw casings for the floor base was ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the screw casings for the floor base was not threaded properly, and we had to use a mallet to hammer it in. Hope we never have to dissemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Gammon 5-Piece Junior Starter Drum Kit with Cymbals, Hardware, Sticks, & Throne - Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackBrand New Junior Drum Set - Absolutely everything you need to start playing! A REAL drum set, just like a full size/adult set, but smaller. Look at these AMAZING features: 16"x10" 12 Lug Bass Drum, Wood Snare drum, Two Hang Toms, Floor tom, 2-8" Hi-Hat Cymbals, 1-10" Crash/Ride Cymbal, Snare Stand, Hi-Hat Stand, Bass drum pedal, Pair drum sticks, Drummers Key, HIGH-GLOSS Black Finish & Chrome Rims...Assembly is required. This set features real wood shells & is the perfect way to get started drumming Top seller ships fast! Makes the ultimate musical gift.
feature_bullets: Absoloutely Everything You Need To Start Playing
5 Piece drum set with Cymbals Stands Sticks Hardware
High Gloss Black Finsih & Black or Chrome Rims - Complete Drum Set
Amazingly Low Price and Ships Fast. Don't over tighten. Doing so will strip the lug
